dict.string: Athena needs access to your calendar to display and manage events.
Athena needs full calendar access to read and display your events.
Athena needs write-only access to add events without reading existing ones.
Athena needs access to your microphone for speech input and voice commands.
Athena uses speech recognition to transcribe your voice into text for AI conversations.
Athena needs accessibility permissions to manage and position windows on your behalf.
